title: Apple's iPad 10th Gen plunges to $279 in early Black Friday price war

Take advantage of the lowest price on record on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with prices falling to $279 at Amazon and Best Buy. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums

excerpt: Grab the lowest iPad 10th Generation price on record as Amazon and Best Buy compete for the best early Black Friday deals.
text: Grab the best iPad 10th Gen price on record Grab the lowest iPad 10th Generation price on record as Amazon and Best Buy compete for the best early Black Friday deals. Early Black Friday iPad price war November is a great time to pick up an Apple device at a discount and iPads are no exception with one week to go before Black Friday. Take advantage of the lowest price on record on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with prices falling to $279 at Amazon and Best Buy. This is the absolute lowest price we've ever seen on the tablet that's great to keep the family entertained during the cold winter months. At press time, all four colorways are eligible for the $70 price drop. The 10th-gen iPad has a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, driven by an A14 Bionic chip. It also has front and back 12MP cameras, Touch ID, and all-day battery life. The standard model comes with 64GB capacity and Wi-Fi 6 connectivity. If you'd like to run an abundance of apps, the 256GB Wi-Fi version is also on sale for $429, down from $499. html:
Grab the best iPad 10th Gen price on record

Grab the lowest iPad 10th Generation price on record as Amazon and Best Buy compete for the best early Black Friday deals.

Early Black Friday iPad price war

November is a great time to pick up an Apple device at a discount and iPads are no exception with one week to go before Black Friday. Take advantage of the lowest price on record on Apple's iPad 10th Generation, with prices falling to $279 at Amazon and Best Buy.

This is the absolute lowest price we've ever seen on the tablet that's great to keep the family entertained during the cold winter months. At press time, all four colorways are eligible for the $70 price drop.

The 10th-gen iPad has a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, driven by an A14 Bionic chip. It also has front and back 12MP cameras, Touch ID, and all-day battery life. The standard model comes with 64GB capacity and Wi-Fi 6 connectivity. If you'd like to run an abundance of apps, the 256GB Wi-Fi version is also on sale for $429, down from $499.

Latest iPad deals

  • iPad 9th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $199.99 ($120 off)
  • iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $279 ($70 off)
  • iPad mini 7 (128GB, Wi-Fi): $449.99 ($50 off) with on-page coupon
  • M2 iPad Air 11-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi): $499 ($100 off)
  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (256GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $949 ($50 off) with My Best Buy Plus
  • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (512GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $1,425 ($75 off) with My Best Buy Plus

Blowout M2 iPad Pro models up to $1,000 off

  • M2 iPad Pro 11-inch (1TB, Wi-Fi + Cellular): $999 ($700 off)
  • M2 iPad Pro 11-inch (2TB, Wi-Fi + Cellular): $1,099 ($1,000 off)

Apple Pencil savings

  • Apple Pencil Pro: $99 ($30 off)
  • Apple Pencil 2: $105.99 ($11 off)
  • Apple Pencil 1st Generation: $79 ($20 off)
